message: I say give the option of both with a slight price break for annual.
I agree with @dparsons. Also, a monthly price point of $25 per year divided into months appears much cheaper and may result in more sales.

One thing to remember is breaking an already small price ($25) into 12 payments incurs additional transaction fees (assuming CC purchase) which will also eat into the small amount of money being charged.
Oh, and if you check out Andrew warner's latest tutorial master class type offer on mixergy.com you have the option of monty
@petersanchez really is about time this changed.
Think vitamin compared forrest's monthly fee against dribbble's annual fee. I'll try put a link up later.
